cast.name: 埃尔坎.帕塔卡亚 Erkan Petekkaya

introduction: Soner and his family decided to migrate to Istanbul by breaking away from the heart of the land. Although they like the village, they come to Istanbul for education of Soner who has Down's syndrome. Their only hope is the state's salary to Soner. The Fikirtepe district, where they are moved in the hope that everything will be better, is an area where urban transformation projects have begun. For the family, the conditions of life in the metropolis move away from a fresh hope..
